name: Terrible Zombie Prison
description:
How to Play?


Step 1
Rush to a prison room to sleep ASAP. The power of dreams brings you the gold to build and upgrade different buildings.



Step 2
Build and upgrade the door and weapons. You can defeat the zombies with weapons and special-skill buildings.



Step 3
The one who survives to the last or kills the zombies will be the winner.



Start and have a try!
